description: It looks very nice and I would like to use it but it immediately throws me onto a login screen without any option, at least that I could find, to change it to a self-hosted instance
summary: It looks okay, but can't select self-hosted instance

description: Started behaving strange after the last update. Not sure what happened, but it's not working as it used to a week an a half ago.
summary: Started Behaving Strange After the Update

description: Please respect the user's GTK settings and theme. The current titlebar is not what I expect and the login page is stark white while my other apps are dark.
summary: Please use native styling for the titlebar

description:
Simple app but it doesn't respect the user's GTK styling (looks like an elementaryOS app which isn't bad but that's not how my desktop looks) and it could use some loading spinners when navigating the app.

But overall great effort that moves Plausible from a web browser to a standalone app.
